short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically removes playlist parameters from YouTube URLs and reloads the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automatically removes playlist parameters from YouTube URLs and reloads the page, offering a cleaner and more focused viewing experience. Perfect for a variety of scenarios:

1. Watch Later Videos: Easily remove videos from your Watch Later list as you view them, without disrupting your viewing session.

2. Course Playlists: Navigate through educational content more efficiently, focusing on individual lectures without playlist distractions.

3. Music Videos: Listen to songs from playlists without automatically advancing to the next track, giving you more control over your listening experience.

4. Tutorial Series: Follow along with multi-part tutorials at your own pace, without worrying about accidental skips to the next video.

5. Sharing Videos: Quickly generate clean, shareable links for specific videos, even if you found them within a playlist.

6. Podcast Episodes: Watch podcast episodes from a channel's playlist without auto-advancing, allowing you to pause and reflect between episodes.

7. Product Reviews: Compare multiple product reviews from a playlist without the distraction of autoplay, helping you make informed decisions.

8. Cooking Recipes: Follow cooking videos step-by-step without worrying about the next recipe in the playlist starting automatically.

9. Workout Routines: Control your exercise video progression manually, ensuring you complete each workout at your own pace.

10. Language Learning: Study language lessons sequentially, with the ability to easily replay videos without playlist interference.

Enjoy a distraction-free, customized YouTube viewing experience.
